alert.note: Alert for Eastern Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 25 at 8:42AM EST until February 25 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 55 mph. * WHERE...In Maryland, Central and Eastern Allegany County. In Virginia, Eastern Highland County. In West Virginia, Eastern Grant, Eastern Mineral and Eastern Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. A few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
